summary:
BNBMiner - BNBMiner is an Economical High Yeld Liquidity Decentralized Experiment distribution Investors are able to buy our token and Earn $BNB just by holding $BNBMiner

 Tokenomics - Supply: 100.000.000
Reward: 10% Daily
WithdrawTax: 3%
TaxFee: 10% (Mining Contract)
proposal:
Hello BNBMiner community! 👋 

Who knew that mining BNB could be as fun as finding a golden ticket in a chocolate bar? 😄

We are here to offer some B2B tools that could enhance your community's experience and align with your vision. We are like the tool shop in the crypto world.

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2 and customize it to fit your $BNBMiner aesthetics. 

2. 🎰 Lottery - A blockchain-based lottery where you can earn 0-30% commission. Imagine a lottery where instead of winning a teddy bear, you win $BNB!

3. 🪙 Wallet - Create a multicurrency crypto wallet that can hold your precious $BNBMiner tokens and more.

4. 🌾 Farming - Create ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming to attract more investments. It's like planting $BNBMiner seeds and watching them grow.

5. 🗳 DAO - Governance and proposals for your $BNBMiner token. It's like a town hall meeting but for your token.

6. 🌉 CrossChain - Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge. It's like building a bridge from $BNBMiner island to other crypto islands.

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad - A launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. It's like a rocket for your $BNBMiner token to the moon.

Remember, it's all B2B, so you're not playing, you're creating. Let's build something amazing together! Check it out https://t.me/onoutdemos 👈
